name: LymeDiseaseTestsForBorreliaBurgdorferimayoniiNucleicAcid
title: Lyme Disease (Tests for Borrelia burgdorferi/mayonii Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Borrelia burgdorferi and Borrelia mayonii Nucleic Acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC search: Borrelia burgdorferi and Borrelia mayonii nucleic acid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
